recommended_degree: Teknik Informatika, Sistem informasi, Teknik Komputer, Teknologi Informasi, Manajemen Informatika (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist in delivering daily IT services to end-users and support the maintenance of IT assets and inventory for both corporate and project environments.
- Ensure all software used is properly licensed and compliant through regular audits.
- Maintain PCs and laptops by ensuring operating systems, applications, and Office 365 are consistently updated.
- Record, monitor, and perform periodic stock checks on all IT equipment, including PCs, laptops, printers, and other peripherals.
